laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 29.0% six weeks before admission, increased to 34.1% on admission, and slightly increased to 34.6% four weeks after discharge.
Decreased to 10.0 g/dL six weeks before admission, increased to 11.8 g/dL on admission, and decreased to 11.5 g/dL four weeks after discharge.
Decreased to 3900 per mm² six weeks before admission, increased to 4800 per mm² on admission, and increased to 7000 per mm² four weeks after discharge.
Decreased to 408,000 per mm³ six weeks before admission, increased to 447,000 per mm³ on admission, and decreased to 330,000 per mm³ four weeks after discharge.
Increased to 1.54 mg/dL six weeks before admission, decreased to 1.34 mg/dL on admission, and decreased to 1.25 mg/dL four weeks after discharge.

laboratory_examinations.findings: CSF protein: 112 mg/dL (normal range: 5–55), white-cell count: 4/mm³, glucose: 68 mg/dL (normal range: 50–75), IgG: 17.4 mg/dL (normal range: 0–8.0)
Protein: 4200 mg/dL (normal range: 5–55), glucose: 100 mg/dL, white-cell count: 106/mm³ with 18% neutrophils, 14% lymphocytes, and 15% monocytes.
Normal level not specified; reported to be 1005 pg/ml (normal range: 31 to 86) after diagnosis.
